description:
Reishirou is the head of the First Student Council on campus. Usually, president of the Student Council is third year student. Though he is in the second grade, he became the president since former president You was chosen as a member of GD. He is another controller of an Asura Machina. Several years earlier, in order to save the spirit of Aine and Reiko, he used the Extractor to take Aine`s soul from her body and allowed her to become the Burial Doll for Hisui.
(1st Stage)
Current president of the Student Council.
name: Saeki Reishirou
